column5: A friend and I put in an evening fish on Nosbonsing tonight and caught four nice eater walleyes We also missed two huge, unidentified fish. He had his on for about a minute, as it just held bottom, gave some head shakes and then the hook slipped. I don't know how he missed it since he set the hook three times... dull hooks maybe, or maybe he hooked it in soft flesh. My big one was a log as I set the hook, but it slipped pretty much immediately.   Oh well... I'm all smiles at catching my first good feed of walleye for the ice season at a new spot. Can't wait for Nipissing to have over 12" of ice so I can hit my regular spots. I hope others are enjoying the recent cold spell too.  Sorry no pics, my hands got cold quick after scooping the minnows with my hands. I forgot a bucket and dip net.  Fish on to all
:thumbsup_anim:  :thumbsup_anim:  :thumbsup_anim:  :thumbsup_anim:   AWESOME RC!  Good to hear you got out.   I also friggin hate forgetting the minnow scoop!
Nice... Can't wait for my first ice fishing trip of the season...  Should be later this week...
Nice going Chad   Sounds like fun Enjoy your first feed of eyes
WTG Chad!!! Too bad we're so far apart. I'd love to get out fishing with ya
It's only 4-5 hours Paul... I think...Lol  Road trip!!!!!!!
For Paul, 6.5 in the winter.  Congrats on your first trip of the season, Chad...and brand new spot too!
nip fisher and i didnt do so well on the other side of the lake, we had a few tiny perch, no eyes!!!!
You guys stay there, I'll bring one of my walleye as bait and we'll fish your rivers! haha.
Forgot to ask. Were ya trolling, or jigging Chad?

You guys caught a bunch earlier this week didn't you? I only caught perch at that spot on Monday... I think that was you guys beside us, was it? I was the guy who drilled like 15 holes before a couple friends showed up.
All vertical. 7 inches of ice. We treaded lightly and followed the shoreline, but the ice in our spot was safe for walking.
nope this was our first time out this year, nip was up north and had a few i think? i was thinking about heading back out tommorrow? were you using chubs or shiners?
I'd like to go tomorrow as well, but I have plans for dinner. We used shiners. Nipfisher knows where we were... just look for our drill holes.
